description:
test: fix index.go to pass with recent index checks

The compiler now gives an error for out of bounds constant
indexes for arrays, and for negative constant indexes for both
arrays and slices.

With this change the index.go test passes if CLs 6815085,
6815088, and 6812089 are committed.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9cfe59382e2d ***

test: fix index.go to pass with recent index checks

The compiler now gives an error for out of bounds constant
indexes for arrays, and for negative constant indexes for both
arrays and slices.

With this change the index.go test passes if CLs 6815085,
6815088, and 6812089 are committed.

R=golang-dev, remyoudompheng, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6810085

On 2012/11/06 07:04:07, remyoudompheng wrote:
> The patch set 1 looked more readable to me

I agree but it turned out to be wrong for GOARCH=386.  The current one still doesn't pass for GOARCH=386, but that seems to be a bug.
The patch set 1 looked more readable to me

subject: code review 6810085: test: fix index.go to pass with recent index checks
